content:
Hi, please excuse me if this isn't the right place!

I'm trying to find an (easy) machine readable version of the data on the page; https://rust-lang.github.io/rustup/installation/other.html. A toml file or similar would be great.

Does anyone know of such a thing?
I'm not aware of any machine-readable sources for those links (other than the markdown/html source itself).
https://github.com/rust-lang/rustup/blob/master/ci/cloudfront-invalidation.txt might not be a bad place.
